title: Shogun (YC W18)
description: I joined Shogun as one of the first engineer and during my time in the company I had an opportunity to work on many core feature implementations. Shogun was accepted to the ”YCombinator W18” and become a successful company.

title: Digital Clipboard
description: While working at Digital Clipboard I led the creation of a scalable multi-platform frontend project with React Native and smart data synchronization layer. Digital Clipboard launched under ”Microsoft Scale-Up London” accelerator.

title: Gametime
description: While working at Digital Clipboard I led the creation of a scalable multi-platform frontend project with React Native and smart data synchronization layer. Digital Clipboard launched under ”Microsoft Scale-Up London” accelerator.

title: Spacelab
description: Spacelab is a digital agency that I co-founded in Tbilisi, Georgia. We connect to clients all over the world offering mobile/web app development and UI/UX design work. We’ve been lucky to work on numerous interesting projects as a team.

title: Ministry of Health
description: My team was accountable to implement digital solutions for the ongoing Health Insurance reform to provide free health care for citizen of Georgia. I enhanced existing reporting tools and wrote software to process terabytes of streaming data.
